title: Software Engineer (L5) - Game Platform Developer Performance Tools
overview: The Software Engineer (L5) - Game Platform Developer Performance Tools position is responsible for building developer workflows and tooling, specifically focusing on tools that provide game developers with actionable performance insights. They should have 8+ years of experience with game development tools and experience with game development engines such as Unity and Unreal, as well as GPU performance optimization. Nice to have is experience with full stack, Node.js, JavaScript/TypeScript, and React.
description:
Software Engineer (L5) - Game Platform Developer Performance Tools

extras.title: Responsibilities:
content: Help define, scope, and plan development of game developer tools
Build new tools and integrate existing development tools to work with our platform

extras.title: This role is a fit if you:
content: Take pride in building high-quality tools for developers
Love working on early stage projects where your contributions make a big difference
Thrive in an environment with lots of context and minimal guidance
Enjoy collaborating with engineers across functional teams
Are a self-starter with excellent communication skills

Experience with game development engines such as Unity and Unreal

extras.title: Nice to have:
